comments_since_last_sample.body: Would watch your show but every day your leading story is Trump I am done

Wow, that was a tough watch.  The TDS at MSNBC is running rampant.  If we want to get into Trump's business, maybe we should also get into Biden's.  The 'boomerang' is coming for the conspiracy democrats.  It will be fun next year when the adults regain control of the government.  Maybe a couple of impeachments would be on the docket?
Julius Jones murdered Paul Howell in front of his children.
She is part of the problem,she is a fountain of misinfomation.

Increased individual empowerment through technology has resulted in some individuals expressing themselves with malicious intent.  Through technology, a faction has succeeded to increase their wealth and influence on the earth beyond what was ever humanly possible in the past.  As their have been no benign, individual autonomy preserving, constructive interventions towards curtailing this, the reaction will be an increasingly dissident, wealth-excluded mob and then militarization with imposed control. Certain privileged and entitled wealthy individuals have little incentive towards preserving democracy despite the fact that they benefited from the freedom and opportunity it provided.  Our peaceful democratic collaboration requires that the participating individuals share in a sufficient trust and confidence in the system's general beneficence. These wealthy individuals wish to maintain their exclusive access to wealth and influence and are using the media to undermine the trust and arouse the masses into acting increasingly disruptively which in turn will trigger interventions to impose a top-down control.  Crime, political discord, and cries to increase centralized control are already escalating in many areas of the world while the government of the US appears in a state of paralysis to make the changes necessary to stave off the oncoming collision.

Sounds like someone is scared of Durham... yeah lets see what happens... Im willing to Bet there will be Big Booms .. and the Boomerang  will be on the ones that created the Russia BS hoax.  I read  documents..
read the Documents then you know whats coming..
